subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Hollywood Park will replace its dirt main track with a synthetic surface in July, making it the first California track to do so. The state's other major thoroughbred tracks face a deadline of Dec. 31, 2007, by the California Horse Racing Board to install synthetic surfaces.
